item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, December 14, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. [Opinion] The London problem is holding young Brits back
2. South Korean president vows to ‘never give up’ after impeachment vote
3. Porsche holding company warns of writedown in Volkswagen stake of up to €20bn
4. Russia appears to pull back its forces in Syria
5. Prosecutors label $650mn McKinsey opioid pact a warning to consultants
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, December 14, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
